Reviews.Title: “comfort and friendliness of this hotel in Berlin, germany”
Reviews.Author: biopharm34
Reviews.Content: stay hotel time berlin business hotel extremely comfortable resonable rates excellent breakfast close fine restaurants tram takes heart city enjoy night clubs fine dining hotel dinners senior staff memebers markus gift clean quiet hotel approx euro 2000 taxi ride berlin tegel airport ubahn train station alle 5 minutes walk offers ubahn sbahn connections majot city berlin drawback iron ironing boards clean elegant extremely comfortable

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel”
Reviews.Author: linda b
Reviews.Content: hotel fantastic hotel clean organised reception staff extremly polite accomodating staff ensure delightful stay located 5 mins tram berlin centre close train station easy commute airport definitely

Reviews.Title: “Very good stay for a great rate !”
Reviews.Author: N0rwegianTravellers
Reviews.Content: 4 times hotel 2 visit december 2 nights choose hotel reasons rate book 5070 euro breakfast choose breakfast it´s easy airports schonefeld s9 train stops station 150m hotel cost 3 euro location explore prenzlauer berg breakfast standard hotel range bread fruit meal cakes finish breakfast size table various sizes bathroom stayed flatscreen tv oldfashioned tvs maybe internett connection cable lobby current wifi system hotel am happy stays

Reviews.Title: “Nice & quiet, very conveniently located”
Reviews.Author: Naomi75
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights july 2011 12hr comfortable pleasant walk inner city tourist attractions 5th floor spacious clean king bed extra single bed reception staff extremely friendly helpful variety breakfast buffet huge mix traditional german cold meats cheeses international hot cuisine automatic parking elevator takes getting caused couple moments relatively car worry overall wonderful stay definitely recommend planning dining reasonably priced huge selection menu multitude dine inner city bit fitness fanatic holiday gym tiny couple weight machines crosstrainer bike

Reviews.Title: “Just perfect. Congratulation”
Reviews.Author: wh0s0ever
Reviews.Content: spent 4 nights attempting itb welcoming till goodbyes awesome guys especially moroccan whatever guy front office help shuttle service itb smart convenient ill definitely

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, convenient location”
Reviews.Author: ErMoviola
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel wife weekend berlin hotel conveniently located tegel airport close public transport nice clean space downsides bed bit bit hot night staff hotel helpful polite

Reviews.Title: “good location,clean and spacious rooms and friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: daisyEssex
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights king bed deluxe accommodate 3 adults spacious clean quality bathroom negative little hot nightour street quiet location excellent easy central berlin schonefeld airport s9 prenzlauer allee station 5 mins walk tram opposite hotel goes alexander platz pleasant restaurants 10 min walk lots cafes individual shops lovely square close preferred central berlin recommend hotelthe staff helpful ideal running park relatively close

Reviews.Title: “Good, clean accommodations”
Reviews.Author: ainparis
Reviews.Content: hotel centrally located tram stop front hotel takes directly alexander platz 15 minutes sbahn stop prenzlauer berg lots cute cafés restaurants couple stops tram basic clean facing street nice quiet bathrooms updating especially bathtubs traveling 2 friends triple spacious comfortable fine looking affordable stay dont mind center

Reviews.Title: “Between average and very good = good”
Reviews.Author: epo376
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 5 days overall deserves average 3 12 star holiday inn location quiet neighbourhood fine system public transport berlin stop tram m2 regular service front hotel town berlin city tour card 6th floor basic beds tv wasnt didnt programs bathroom bath shower shower beats bath poor shower towels renewed daily basis missing safe store documents valuables mandatory travelling days hour free internet daily breakfast ok luxuries weekdays till 1030 weekends 12 oclock real restaurant didnt priority copy bill automatically account

Reviews.Title: “Cheap and cheerful.”

Reviews.Content: effecient inoffensive value try bizarre multilevel parking apparatus car experience unless actually hang prenzlauer district note located expensive hotels city centre hotel doesnt claim prime real estate heart berlin im somewhat surprised tripadvisor reviews marking hotel basis

Reviews.Title: “Felt like I was in a luxury hotel - fantastic find”
Reviews.Author: globalem
Reviews.Content: stayed days trip february bit concerned location didnt shops finding feet realised location stones throw train station easy airport tram stop literally front lovely near hotel restaurants mexcian street called beginning street hotel nice nicest stayed time clean crisp white bedding luxury bathroom staff front desk friendly definitely recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Quite ok”
Reviews.Author: piotrwasil
Reviews.Content: average expect fancy 3 star quality bathroom clean bit time unfortunately additional services paid dont rate getting expensive tried breakfast choice lot food pay 10 euro recommend range definitely

Reviews.Title: “Great Breakfest, wonderfull staff.”
Reviews.Author: barakl
Reviews.Content: 3 nights hotel situated 3 minutes walk train tram hotel internet access downstairs 1 hour free wireless connection hour pay breakfast besides regular food own pancake enjoy fresh fruit salad etc abit

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Experience, Highly Recommend It! Check out the Breakfast Too!”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel berlin 2010 marathon little skeptical regarding location reasonable compared name hotels familiar staff service accommodations id hoped housed 3 adults comfortably clean date friendly helpful englishspeaking location public transportation recommend unsure booking overseas time

Reviews.Title: “Toll und Preiswertiges”

Reviews.Content: fantastic location business pleasure trip berlin easy access shoping restauarants antique shops cafes parks etc city wonderful public transportation system close ring subway major tram lines aspect hotel breakfast surprisingly filling skip lunch altogether simple extremely clean difficult hear noise neighboring professional service internet lobby free usage crowded recommend pay wireless instead dry cleaning service express cleaning corner wonderful time

Reviews.Title: “It's clean, cheap and allright!”

Reviews.Content: time holiday inn hotel happy stay hotel approximately 500m nearest sbahn station connection hotel clean average size negative tiny bit mould bathroom shower trigger allergy strike tv set thats serious budget alternative berlin prenzlauer berg district
